title: Bodyguard Boss

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Choose one player to become a Bodyguard for another at night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Each night you may select two targets. The first player will be protected by the second player. This will override any night actions that the second player took if they took any.
- If anyone attacks the first player, the attack will instead be redirected to the second player, and the second player will deal an Unstoppable attack to the attacker.
- You may only successfully protect one player.
- You may only enforce each individual player to act as a Bodyguard one time.
- You may not protect yourself.
